message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $11,500 feels fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price closer to my budget. How about $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $10,500 for it.
